Text: Yet another bait+switch by $MSFT, eliminating license benefits to force MS use. 1st, MS took away BYOL SQL Server on RDS, now no Windows upgrades w/BYOL on#AWS. Hard to trust a co. who raises prices, eliminates benefits, + restricts freedom of choice. https://t.co/h4RkFHzcjP

Fairly astonishing that $msft is a trillion dollar market cap company without being dominant in smartphones or browser market share despite the two platforms being the most significant in tech. They still sell a lot of desktop software.

Microsoft was the largest company in the world back in 2000.Then it suffered a 70% drawdown over the next 9 years to its low in March 2009.It did not surpass its 2000 high until 2014, 14 years later (total return).Today it is once again the largest company in the world.$MSFT https://t.co/yH6uOBz4C9
$10,000 invested in the Microsoft IPO in March 1986 is worth over $23 million today, an annualized return of over 26%. New all-time high. $MSFT https://t.co/htz7u2vwdT
